description.fr: {%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v Pose {value:p2}\_{FloorMechanism:394}. Tous les {value:t} tours, en pose une supplémentaire par mort de {Summoning:1259!}. Sauf si votre héros est TRANSFORMÉ. \--- Puis invoque {value:p}\_{%clan_mortbrule_name,value:p}. En invoque un supplémentaire par tour de jeu. Limité à {value:m} monstres maximum. \--- Puis confère {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} et {ARvalue:ar,+} par tour de jeu aux {%clan_mortbrule_name,plural:other}.
description.en: {%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v Places {value:p2}\_{FloorMechanism:394,value:p2}. Every {value:t} {t, plural, one[turn] other[turns]}, places an additional one each time {Summoning:1259!} dies. Unless your hero is TRANSFORMED. \--- Then summons {value:p}\_{%clan_mortbrule_name,value:p}. Summons an additional one per game turn. Limit: {value:m} {m, plural, one[monster] other[monsters]} maximum. \--- Then confers {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} and {ARvalue:ar,+} per game turn on the {%clan_mortbrule_name,plural:other}.
description.es: {%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v Pone {value:p2}\_{FloorMechanism:394}. Cada {value:t} turnos, pone una más por muerte de {Summoning:1259!}. Salvo si tu héroe está TRANSFORMADO. \--- Luego invoca {value:p}\_{%clan_mortbrule_name,value:p}. Invoca uno más por turno de juego. Limitado a {value:m} monstruos máximo. \--- Luego confiere {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} y {ARvalue:ar,+} por turno de juego a los {%clan_mortbrule_name,plural:other}.
description.de: {%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v Platziert {value:p2}\_{FloorMechanism:394}. Platziert alle {value:t} Runden einen zusätzlichen für jeden Tod von {Summoning:1259!}. Es sei denn, dein Held ist VERWANDELT. \--- Beschwört dann {value:p}\_{%clan_mortbrule_name,value:p}. Beschwört einen zusätzlichen für jede Spielrunde. Auf max. {value:m}\_Monster begrenzt. \--- Verleiht den {%clan_mortbrule_name,plural:other} anschließend {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} und {ARvalue:ar,+} pro Spielrunde.
description.pt: {%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v Coloca {value:p2}\_{FloorMechanism:394}. A cada {value:t} turnos, coloca uma poção adicional toda vez que {Summoning:1259!} morre. Exceto se seu herói estiver TRANSFORMADO. \--- Depois, invoca {value:p}\_{%clan_mortbrule_name,value:p}. Invoca um Morto-Queimado adicional por turno de jogo. Limite de {value:m} monstros no máximo. \--- Em seguida, concede {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} e {ARvalue:ar,+} por turno de jogo aos {%clan_mortbrule_name,plural:other}.
